description: ICS techniques mitigated by Safety Instrumented Systems, ATT&CK mitigation M0812 (v1.0)
name: Safety Instrumented Systems (M0812)

techniques.comment: Ensure that all SIS are segmented from operational networks to prevent them from being targeted by additional adversarial behavior.
Ensure that all SIS are segmented from operational networks to prevent them from being targeted by additional adversarial behavior.
